definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: (a) possession, inheritance;—abs. ´[[יר]] De 2:5 + 7 t., cstr. [[יְרֻשַּׁת]] Ju Jdg 21:17, Ps 61:6 (but on text v. infr.); sf. [[יְרֻשָּֽׁתְְ]] 2Ch 20:11; [[יְרֻשָּׁתוֹ]] De 2:12, De 3:20; [[יְרֻשַּׁתְכֶם]] Jos 1:15; —used of land De 2:5, De 2:9, De 2:9, De 2:19, De 2:19, De 3:20; [[אֶרֶץ יְרֻשָּׁתוֹ]] De 2:12 the land of his possession, so Jos 1:15; further, Jos 12:6, Jos 12:7, Ju Jdg 21:7 (but Bu:Rs 152 [[נִשְׁאֲרָה]]), Je 32:8, Psalm Ps 61:6 (but < [[אֲרֶשֶׁת]] request, cf. Che:crit. n.), 2Ch 20:11.
